data.title: ‎Impossible to verify a negative!
data.meta_description:
I tried to correct an error in the credits of IMMORAL TALES (1973) by Walerian Borowczyk; an actress was credited who did not appear in the film. 
How does one verify the absence of someone in a fi...
data.text:
Reason Unable to verify.

Your contribution has been declined.We have been unable to verify your contribution. Unfortunately we were unable to accept your submission as we were unable to verify the information provided. If your submission was placed via the IMDb.com Desktop title or name page submission form, you now have an option to provide evidence with your additions, as well as corrections or deletions. Please go to your Contribution History, re-load the submission reference and tick the box “provide an explanation to assist in processing this submission” and “check these updates”. The field will become available in the submission form. For all other submissions, please see ourHelp Sitefor further information or details on how to contact us.

Reason Unable to verify.

Your contribution has been declined.We have been unable to verify your contribution. Unfortunately we were unable to accept your submission as we were unable to verify the information provided. If your submission was placed via the IMDb.com Desktop title or name page submission form, you now have an option to provide evidence with your additions, as well as corrections or deletions. Please go to your Contribution History, re-load the submission reference and tick the box “provide an explanation to assist in processing this submission” and “check these updates”. The field will become available in the submission form. For all other submissions, please see our Help Site for further information or details on how to contact us.

The problem is this: IMMORAL TALES exists in 2 versions, the shorter (103 mins) having 4 episodes, the longer (125 mins) having 5, including Story 3, "The Beast", as explained in my submission. I watched the longer version (by Argos Films) on an online streaming service. This extended version has no credits for Story 3.
